about_the_game:
Help Apocalypse Bunny save Christmas, just like it says in the title!



New quests:


Go to the Boston Museum of Science and talk to the survivors to initiate this quest.


Talk to Dana Khan at Innsmouth to initiate this quest.


Initiated after you have spoken to Apocalypse Bunny in the Black Woods at least once, and you have reached Act 2.

Help Apocalypse Bunny, Lord of Halloween, spread Christmas Cheer to the children of Innsmouth! Journey to the frozen, bombed out wastes of Canada in your quest to reignite the spirit of the holidays for the youth of the Lovecraft apocalypse.

  • New area: Canada!
  • Three new bosses, two of which are avoidable.

Quest Pack: 2.5/3
